title: Bug 128155Set UrlRedirect to marker range, preview, can not work.
description: Set UrlRedirect to marker range, preview, can not work.Steps:Data source: sample dbData set: select  from customers1.Create a bar chart2.Go to "Select Data" tab, X series: row["CUSTOMERNAME"]; Y series:row["CREDITLIMIT"]3.Go to "Format Chart" tab, select X axis, click "Markers" button, add a range,from 2.0 to 5.0; range color is yellow; click Interactivity button, add UrlRedirect;4.Preview in web viewerActual Results:1.The interactivity can not workExpected Results:1.The interactivity can work.
